description: There’s not much time before his dinner party and Andy Dick needs a pair of chefs to pull it all together so it doesn’t turn into a total disaster. He seeks out the talent of rival cooks Vito Gallo and Rod Daily, who bicker back and forth after being ushered into the kitchen by Andy’s wife, Lady Bunny. After Andy and Lady exit and leave the guys to their work, cooking is the last thing on their mind. The only thing that heats up are the men themselves after they strip off their cooking clothes and focus on each other: the guys don’t care if they get their jobs done so long as they get each other done! Vito Gallo is on top, Rod Daily is on the bottom, and tune in to see if he can handle the Italian power-top’s cock!
title: Vito Gallo Pounds Rod Daily’s Ass
